title: Google Chrome & Microsoft Edge to get 'Save Frame' feature for YouTube
description: You can soon right-click on any YouTube video in Microsoft Edge or Google Chrome and save the frame (capture the screenshot of the video) in the original resolution and PNG format. [...]

title: Iranian hackers launch malware attacks on Israel’s tech sector
description: Security researchers have tracked a new campaign from Imperial Kitten targeting transportation, logistics, and technology firms. [...]

title: Microsoft Edge is testing a new video translation feature
description: Microsoft Edge's latest Canary update has an innovative feature: video translation. This feature translates YouTube videos in real-time, and it allegedly supports four languages. [...]
